plot: Major Murphy, a US Army Investigator, has received a new assignment. Sgt. Gammon is suspected of dealing cocaine from his base, and Murphy must gather enough evidence to shut down Gammon and his entire operation. Along with his partner, Lt. Andrews, the Major goes undercover to infiltrate the gang and find out just how far up the chain of command these activities are going.   Written by  Jean-Marc Rocher
title: El color del honor

cast.role: Maj. John Murphy / Cpl. John Dalton
cast.name: Mark Dacascos
